name: Reversi Curling
description:
A game made by Distant Orange

Reversi Curling is a game where you play curling with a twist inspired by the classic Reversi board game.

Reverse the color of your opponents pieces to score and secure your victory in versus mode!
Or try your hand in the Challenge Mode, where you'll need to collect flags and score points. Can you tackle this challenge?

How to play:
Mouse controls only
Play in full screen if possible!

This was created for the Mini Jame Gam #14
The theme was: Reverse
The special object was: Flag

Everything was made for the Jam only.

Thanks for playing!

Nikkilite - Developer
